James Bond.Action: Stands apart from the crowd, observing others carefully and noticing the sommelier pouring champagne preferentially to a man rather than nearby women.
Warms immediately to Marina Varoskaya and shows interest in her, indicating openness and friendliness.
Stands apart from the crowd, carefully observing others and noting subtle details like the sommelier's preferential treatment.
His attention to detail suggests vigilance and suspicion rather than casual engagement.
Does not join the crowd's celebratory mood, indicating focus on his mission and situational awareness.
Smiles and uses a non-confrontational approach when speaking to the sommellier despite language barrier.
Breaks away from Marina abruptly to follow the sommellier.
Smiles non-confrontationally and attempts friendly communication with the sommelier despite language barrier.
Criticizes the sommelier for improper champagne serving etiquette, implying social awareness but a brusque tone.
Engages in violent confrontation by shooting at the sommelier and evading attacks, prioritizing survival and mission over courtesy.
Takes out a more powerful Walther P-88 confidently when faced with a threat.
Fires at the sommellier while managing to avoid harm by quick and strategic movements behind cars and a train.
Uses the environment effectively for cover and maneuvers precisely to evade explosive shells.
Maintains composure despite being cornered and surrounded by explosions.
Attempts to communicate with the sommellier with a witty, yet subtle comment on proper etiquette, indicating situational awareness.
Gives a critical comment to the sommellier about proper etiquette regarding serving champagne to ladies first.
Engages in violent confrontation with the sommellier who attacks him first, focusing on self-defense and survival.
Knocks out glass and escapes from a deadly situation, prioritizing his own safety to survive.
Quickly draws Walther P-88 when threatened and fires at the sommellier; uses cover effectively by rolling behind cars and moving strategically to avoid gunfire and explosive shells.
When cornered with no forward path due to fire and explosions, chooses to escape by breaking and climbing out of a high-speed train window despite the extreme danger.
Opts to leave the confined dangerous space rather than risk being caught in explosion; demonstrates presence of mind under pressure.
Attempts to verbally correct sommellier on protocol before violence erupts, but this has no effect and escalates the conflict.
Engages in violent combat with the sommellier, firing his gun to defend himself and others.
Allows himself a split second to look back at Marina, intrigued by her bravery despite the danger.
Risking his life by clinging to the outside of a speeding train to survive and protect others.
Shows no obvious concern or acknowledgement of the crowd's panic and fear during the attack.
Takes out a Walther P-88 confidently and fires at the sommellier during a high-stakes gunfight aboard a speeding train.
Ducks away from explosive shells and navigates behind cars and train sides to avoid being hit or caught in explosions under intense pressure.
When cornered by explosions and fire inside the train car, chooses to safely exit by breaking a window and climbing outside at high speed despite extreme danger.
Maintains physical and mental control clinging onto the outside of a train at 300 mph during intense explosions, displaying exceptional skill and focus.
Briefly allows himself a moment to observe Marina while still fighting wind and threat of being blown off, showing calm awareness amidst chaos.
Skids badly after being thrown by an explosion and loses grip momentarily, indicating slight physical vulnerability under extreme conditions.
Looks back at Marina with intrigue despite the danger he faces, indicating a moment of connection.
Fights for survival alone, showing focus on self-preservation without evident concern for others' safety.
Knocks out the glass of the train window with the Walther and climbs out, hanging onto the outside of a train moving at three hundred miles an hour and pulls himself out despite deafening wind.
Allows himself a split second to look back at Marina while fighting the strong wind threatening to peel him off the train’s side.
Crouches low and starts running on top of a speeding, burning train, reacting to exploding cars and maintaining balance.
Lands badly after an explosion throws him forward, skidding half off the train, but desperately grips the smooth, sleek siding and manages to stabilize himself.
Draws his Walther after pulling himself firmly onto the roof but loses the gun when a chain lashes at his hand.
Engages in close combat atop a speeding train with a heavily armed opponent wielding a chain, forced to move to the engine car with no place to duck back.
Uses the moment of the sommellier’s uncertain footing after an explosion to lunge and fall forward, attempting a strategic move in combat.
Climbs onto a moving train, kicks through the windshield, and climbs inside under extreme danger.
Lands in the engine compartment with a bomb ticking and under machine gunfire, quickly assesses the situation.
Chooses to run back into an adjacent car under heavy gunfire rather than stay and try to defuse the bomb immediately.
Shows a brief expression of hopelessness when the bomb timer counts down, but then quickly finds new determination and runs towards the auto ferry car.
Drives Aston Martin skillfully to save himself and neutralize enemy threat.
Uses the Aston Martin to drive out of a train roof, races ahead of an exploding train, knocks a helicopter off balance by ramming its skids, and escapes a deadly explosion with precise timing.
Stops to help Aimee with her overheated car despite his own troubles.
Uses charm and suggests sharing time with Aimee to make the best of a bad situation.
Maintains control of the Aston Martin despite difficult conditions, successfully brings the car to a halt safely.
Quickly assesses Aimee's problem and thoughtfully offers a solution using the sommellier’s spike.
Not directly shown in this excerpt; no explicit actions or statements of Bond visible here.
No direct actions observed in this excerpt; focus is on Trevelyan and others.
Does not appear or act in the excerpt, no demonstrated competence or incompetence.
No direct actions or involvement shown in the excerpt; does not intervene or respond to the escalating situation involving the Tempest satellite and Soviet forces.
The helicopters under Bond’s control remain unaffected by the EMP blast that disables the enemy Migs, showcasing his use of superior equipment and planning.
No direct action or statement by Bond in this excerpt to evaluate competence.
No direct action or involvement in the excerpt provided.
Smiles slightly while observing the chaotic scene with calm composure, indicating awareness and control.
Does not intervene during the unfolding crisis in the Jaguar, suggesting controlled patience or a strategic choice to observe.
Smiles slightly when talking about the rude waiter, showing mild amusement.
Engages in playful, friendly banter with his secretary Loelia Ponsonby, returning her smile and expressing interest in continuing their conversation.
Displays some disinterest when instructing Ponsonby to contact the consortium, indicating a focus on work over interpersonal warmth.
Analyzes digital photo and asks for further intelligence on known associates, directing his secretary efficiently.
Shows slight disinterest and distraction when ordering to contact the train consortium, displaying less engagement than expected.
Maintains professional demeanor and wit with his secretary, balancing work and personal interaction subtly.
Punches elevator button to trigger the elevator trap on the gas-filled floor, demonstrating planning and use of the environment against the enemy.
Lights the fuse on his car's rocket boosters to speed away, showing confidence and skill driving the DB7.
Arrives on time to a meeting with Q and M and engages in casual, confident banter despite Q's frostiness.
Interacts patiently and informatively with senior officials, explaining 'kaggabe' calmly and clearly.
Tenses silently upon hearing that the stroke was artificially induced but does not react emotionally or express sympathy.
Carefully analyzes wreckage photos and deduces cause of crash logically, collaborates smoothly with Q and M without showing frustration or condescension.
Identifies that the planes were destroyed on impact and deduces the cause was an electromagnetic pulse causing operating system failure in flight.
Understands the grave significance of the 'Tempest' weapon and immediately accepts the critical mission to investigate in Moscow.
Passively receives the mission folder and breaks the seal without question or hesitation, indicating readiness and professionalism.
No hesitation or doubt shown in response to the complexities and potential dangers of the mission.
Uses computer to identify suspects, showing proactive intelligence gathering.
Discovered enemy agents before they could act.
Was targeted for assassination but apparently survived.
Thinks too much while lighting a cigarette, showing introspection and a moment of vulnerability.
No direct interaction with others in this excerpt; mostly silent observer.
Thinks deeply and assesses situation calmly while lighting a cigarette in a tense environment (Moscow Red Square).
Is referenced by enemy Trevelyan as a significant threat that could have been avoided if trustworthy people were used, indicating Bond's capability to disrupt enemy plans.
No direct action from Bond shown in this excerpt related to resolving or influencing the current immediate conflict.
Smiles and responds warmly to Romaly’s greeting and banter, suggesting a friendly rapport.
Cuts Romaly off when he apologizes for mentioning a painful past, showing a desire to move on without dwelling on negative emotions.
Shows amusement and smiles at Romaly’s hunting analogy, indicating openness and good-natured engagement.
Shows a terse, darkened expression when asked about past experiences in Russia, indicating guardedness or possible emotional distance.
Responds calmly and politely to Romaly's challenge to fight without escalating tension, showing confidence and control.
Conceals emotional reaction and avoids revisiting painful past experiences when Romaly inquires about previous Russia visit, maintaining professionalism.
Quickly redirects conversation towards mission objectives after Romaly's slip about Bond's past, demonstrating focus and situational awareness.
Engages with Romaly’s analogy of hunting to understand the tactical situation and implies willingness to play the role of 'bait' at the diplomatic reception.
Engages General Pushkin in a polite handshake and conversation despite underlying suspicion.
Half-listens to Romaly's serious anecdote about black market warheads, showing inattentiveness to others' concerns.
Observes the crowd carefully during a diplomatic event, noting key individuals and potential threats.
Engages a suspicious KGB general in conversation, maintaining composure and cordiality while sensing underlying tension.
Only half-listens to an anecdote about an operational warhead while focusing on situational awareness.
Politely shakes hands with General Pushkin and engages in a calm, measured conversation despite underlying tension.
Uses a subtle joke about the caviar to ease tension and help Pushkin snap out of his astonishment.
Presses a sensitive question about a termination warrant directly, showing determination but also risking offense.
Samples the better caviar casually after being warned, displaying an icy demeanor and disregard for potential consequences or warmth in social interaction.
Directly confronts General Pushkin with a pointed question about a termination warrant while remaining composed and calm.
Uses subtle psychological tactics, such as endorsing the superior caviar to unnerve Pushkin and regain control of the conversation.
Remains cool under pressure despite Pushkin’s threats and warnings about pursuing the conversation further.
Casually samples caviar after a tense exchange, signaling confidence and lack of intimidation.
Allows Pushkin to order a KGB agent to escort him away, potentially risking being detained without showing resistance.
Expresses clear hostility and desire to kill Trevelyan, showing restrained self-discipline but no warmth.
Politely acknowledges Trevelyan’s survival but refuses his handshake, indicating coldness and distrust.
Engages in conversation with Trevelyan, showing sincerity and willingness to confront past betrayals directly.
Maintains self-discipline despite overwhelming desire to kill Trevelyan immediately.
Recognizes Trevelyan's smirking confidence and remains composed, not showing surprise.
Does not take Trevelyan's hand, signaling caution and awareness of threat.
Expresses disappointment in not having killed Trevelyan personally, showing focus on mission completion.
Engages Trevelyan in a verbal exchange, confronting his betrayal with quiet contempt, indicating emotional control and intelligence.
Responds to Trevelyan's accusations with controlled fury; offers to intervene despite personal risk.
Shows dark laughter and bitterness toward Trevelyan, indicating personal animosity.
Maintains composure in tense social situation, refrains from escalating conflict despite provocation.
Controls his fury silently and does not engage in reckless bravado despite provocation by Trevelyan.
Refuses to be intimidated and stands firm when KGB agents attempt to escort him away.
Maintains composure and continues to gather intelligence during tense situations (e.g., discussing Trevelyan and KGB operations with Romaly).
Exhibits a dark laugh about Trevelyan’s diplomatic status, showing awareness but perhaps a lapse into cynicism.
Shares a very dark laugh about receiving diplomatic status for an enemy, showing cynicism.
Turns away from advice, appears agitated and alone as he thrashes in the pool, indicating internal struggle and emotional distance.
Despite agitation, he follows Romaly's advice not to provoke opposition further, showing self-control and strategic patience.
Thrashed through the water in the steam bath, attempting to swim off tension, indicating an effort to manage stress and maintain focus.
Quietly alerts and subdues an unseen intruder with a leverage hold, maintaining composure and caution.

Detects presence of an unseen person in the fogged steam room while swimming, remains composed, and quickly takes control by grabbing and throwing the intruder into a steam room without breaking stride.
Immediately retrieves his weapon and enters cautiously but halts when surprised by unexpected presence of Xenia, indicating alertness and adaptability.
Does not show panic or hesitation after the surprise, instead maintaining composure in a potentially threatening and provocative situation.
Drapes towel around his shoulders and smiles, no longer pointing gun at Xenia, speaks with casual charm and humor.
Thanks Xenia for being forthcoming and engages her in polite conversation despite her being an adversary.
Remains unshaken and maintains eye contact with Xenia during tense interaction.
Gently removes Xenia's hands from his chest and then draws her closer into a kiss.
Responds to Xenia's teasing by making a light joke about the foreman being hung over.
Allows Xenia to shift close to him and engage in playful, intimate banter.
Moves unnoticed in the crowd and carefully approaches his target location without drawing attention.
Understands and follows Xenia's explanation about the building's structure and crawlspace, asks for guidance on accessing it.
Successfully blends into the crowd at Moscow, wearing appropriate attire and moving unnoticed into a restricted area.
Casually opens and reads a note with diagrams while navigating the metro station, showing situational awareness and multitasking.
Lightly kicks away a wandering rat while climbing through a debris-filled narrow shaft.
Uses advanced gadgetry (dayplanner) efficiently and carefully to scout thermal images through sealed doors to avoid unnecessary risk.
Silently traces acidic ink through metal to gain entry without causing attention or harm.
Uses an acid pen to carefully carve through a sealed door to escape, showing patience and persistence under pressure.
Observes the suffering and death of a trapped rat caused by poisonous gas, understanding the horror but remaining focused on escape.
Uses an electronic dayplanner skillfully to perform a thermal scan and detect KGB office workers through a sealed door.
Chemically carves through a metal door using an acid pen, showing technical skill and resourcefulness.
Quickly realizes a pressure sensor triggered an alarm and that dangerous gas is rising, indicating situational awareness and experience.
Attempts to force open the door physically after the acid fails to open it, showing persistence and decisiveness.
Does not have a clear escape plan after entering the shaft, as revealed by the absence of an exit and trap-like setup.
Despite his efforts, is caught off-guard by the lethal Serin gas trap, suggesting incomplete threat anticipation.
Shows intense physical effort and perseverance to escape the gas-filled shaft despite danger.
Uses an acid-pen skillfully to trace the door seal and attempts to open the door.
Despite initial failure, he persistently throws his weight against the door and leverages the cylinder's upward motion to slowly push the door open.
Maintains footing and balance after falling twenty feet onto the edge above the gas cylinder, showing physical control under extreme stress.
Successfully squeezes through the narrowly opened door just before the nerve gas reaches him, demonstrating quick thinking and timely action.
Falls twenty feet after a beam breaks while attempting to escape.
Opts not to confront Xenia to avoid causing trouble or danger.
Blends in with the crowd, trying to avoid drawing attention despite being under surveillance.
Carefully squeezes through a narrow opening in a supply room to avoid gas, showing physical agility and awareness.
Removes outer jacket to reveal a neat, appropriate disguise, helping him blend in as a high-ranking KGB official rather than a disheveled intruder.
Moves through a heavily surveilled compound blending in with crowds despite the presence of a mini-helicopter surveillance device, demonstrating situational awareness and composure.
Chooses not to confront Xenia to avoid drawing attention and risking capture or death, displaying prudent judgment and self-control.
Moves inconspicuously and briskly through the tower, avoiding detection without causing disturbances.
Moves inconspicuously toward the stairs instead of the elevator under surveillance, showing awareness of his environment and avoiding detection.
Calmly approaches a secure armored glass double-door cage requiring a key card and attention of a desk attendant, indicating composure in a complex security situation.
Kicks the door angrily and forcibly hangs up the attendant's phone, intimidating him.
Makes himself noticed after sneaking in unnoticed, demonstrating assertiveness but no friendliness.
Leaves the attendant an opportunity to respond with an apologetic look, does not escalate further.
Accepts a note with phone number shyly given by a female file clerk and returns to his work without making a scene.
Quietly searches through files, noticing razored out pages and carefully uses a hidden camera lens to gather information without disturbing others.

Systematically searches through file binders, notices a binder is empty and detects pages have been razored out, tries another binder, finds relevant information, uses hidden camera in dayplanner to capture data.
Accepts a note with a phone number from the female file clerk and walks away without further inquiry or comment.
Reacts briefly to Marina's dossier photo but suppresses reflection to focus on the mission.
Turns pages and records information as quickly as possible, reacts to important info but prioritizes mission, initiates data encryption to protect gathered intel, moves quickly toward exit.
Shuts the binder and replaces it without allowing personal distraction to interfere with mission.
Quickly records sensitive information and initiates encryption to protect data.
Shuts the binder after noting a sensitive detail but does not dwell on it, maintaining focus on the mission.
Implements encryption and successfully transmits data despite pursuit.
Outsmarts pursuer by stopping elevator, trapping the enemy momentarily.
Runs through dangerous situation under fire and manages to avoid injury while continuing mission tasks.
Maintains calm and situational awareness, using technological tools effectively under stress.
Runs past the elevator under fire to stop it, trapping his pursuer Xenia temporarily.
Focuses on encrypting and transmitting critical data while escaping, showing priority on mission over interpersonal interaction.
Uses deception by leaving a decoy (file cart) while under fire to evade pursuers.
Quickly encrypts sensitive information on his dayplanner before making his escape.
Runs past the elevator and rips open the top cage gate to stop the elevator and trap the pursuer, Xenia.
Successfully transmits data to Station Moscow despite intense pursuit and security measures.
Avoids gunfire and flying glass from the mini-helicopter while continuing his escape.
Uses a decoy tactic by leaving the dayplanner on a file cart to mislead pursuers and survive a fusillade of bullets.
Runs past elevator, stops it to trap and delay pursuer Xenia, allowing himself to gain distance.
Uses deception (file cart decoy) to mislead pursuers and trigger self-destruction, escaping safely.
Avoids direct confrontations by using clever tactics and escape routes instead of engaging directly.
Risked his life making a difficult jump to escape and securing critical intelligence by securing the dayplanner.
Shows no hesitation or emotional reaction to the danger or the suffering of others (guards and technicians) around him while escaping under fire.
Survives dangerous jump by calculating odds, takes extreme physical risks to escape; no interaction indicating consideration for others shown.
Destroys hostile helicopter and evades enemies aggressively; focused on self-preservation and mission success without evident friendliness or trust-building.
Sits down calmly to play chess with Romaly, engages in quiet, focused conversation.
Attempts to conceal interest and disappointment when Romaly clarifies information.
Makes a simple, practical move in chess; keeps conversation low and professional.
Considers Romaly's warning about hatred ruling judgment, but insists on needing documentation and a cautious approach before acting.
Uses strategic thinking and decisiveness in chess analogy to outline the dangers of Trevelyan's plans, demonstrating trustworthiness and sincerity in his assessment.
Identifies a likely mastermind behind the assassinations through logical deduction and strategic thinking in the chess game analogy, making decisive moves that outmaneuver Romaly.
Requests documentation before proceeding, showing prudence and understanding of the need for concrete evidence before acting.
Observed as silent, not intervening in tense interactions at checkpoint.
Not present or directly involved in this excerpt; no action to evaluate.
Shows calm confidence and uses authentic ID to gain access, demonstrating respect for protocol without unnecessary conflict.
Does not escalate confrontation with Roskovitch despite being initially turned away.
Produces an authentic United Nations ID card to convincingly assert his authority and gain access.
Attempts to pass as part of the inspection team rather than press, showing tactical deception and confidence.
Produces an authentic looking United Nations ID card to bluff past a barricade and confidently drives through after a verbal challenge.
Uses sharp, cutting language to pressure a guard and assert control over the situation, showing psychological savvy and authority.
Despite challenges and a tense situation, successfully bypasses an obstacle without visible hesitation or error.
Examines the briefcase carefully, but shows no visible emotional reaction to the potentially dangerous object, maintaining a blank, professional expression.
Approaches Alexei with arrogance and bulldozes his way into the chamber despite Alexei's attempts to steer him out.
Engages directly and assertively to confront misuse of military technology, showing a professional sense of duty.
Boldly confronts Alexei about illegal weapons misuse, pushes forward despite resistance.
Uses confident and arrogant tone to unnerve opponent.
Proceeds inside the chamber without hesitation, showing command of the situation.
Drops his act and confronts Alexei about Trevelyan's payment, indicating directness and a lack of pretense.
Mocks Illya Borchenko by rubbing in past failures, demonstrating sarcasm and personal insult.
Mocks Illya Borchenko’s past failure to provoke him.
Fights ruthlessly with Illya to survive, kills him to stop a threat.
Grabs an iron bar just in time to defend himself against Illya’s gunfire and successfully wounds Illya with a well-timed strike.
Slamms Illya again and uses the environment to gain advantage by sending the handcart down the rail despite Illya still firing at him.
Pauses to find the source of banging, then pulls release pin to open warhead casing and discovers Marina alive.
Reacts to Marina's hostile kick with surprise but does not retaliate aggressively.
Uses warhead casings effectively as cover while under fire.
Notices a timer counting down and realizes urgency to escape quickly.
Carefully identifies which warhead casing the banging is coming from and opens it to rescue Marina.
Is caught off guard when Marina unexpectedly kicks him, pushing him into Illya’s line of fire.
Lunges out at Illya, knocking him back and away as numerous nuclear warheads begin to fall, indicating quick reflexes and physical capability under extreme pressure.
Is pinned in a dangerous position with no apparent escape route as Illya approaches to shoot, showing a momentary lack of better positioning or strategic retreat.
Slams Illya back to protect himself and runs toward the closing blast door to escape imminent danger.
Dives through a closing blast door at the last possible moment, skillfully avoiding falling debris and rolling missiles while running in near-darkness.
Cups his hands over his ears before landing after diving through the blast door, showing awareness of the danger and preparation.
Continues to run and dodge dangerous obstacles under extreme pressure and low visibility.

Assesses rapidly collapsing environment, identifies no obvious escape routes, and quickly chooses a risky but possible action by running across a collapsing chamber and grabbing a seismic cable to avoid falling.
Displays presence of mind under extreme physical danger, maintaining focus on survival despite collapsing ceiling, falling rocks, and opening fissures.
Tries to reassure Marina, despite hostility, by telling her she is still in danger and he did not kill anyone.
Does not respond aggressively to Rosskovitch's warning kick, maintains composure.
Kicks open the door to the monitoring station.
Braces as the cable roughly brakes and comes to a halt at the top
Kicks open the door that houses the Corrtex cable and moves out quickly
Wakes up groggy with hands cuffed and remains aware of surroundings, recognizing the location
Calmly tells Marina that he did not kill any of them and warns her of ongoing danger despite being captured
Does not respond aggressively to Rosskovitch’s warning kick and tries to communicate important information
Tries to convince Marina to trust him and warns her despite facing hostility and danger.
Kicks away a rifle pointed at Marina to protect her, even though he risks his own safety.
Expresses frustration that Marina does not trust him but continues to try to communicate the threat.
Attempts to convince Marina of an imminent danger despite her skepticism, showing awareness of the situation and urgency.
Kicks away a guard's rifle to protect Marina but is immediately knocked unconscious by a blow to the head.
Demonstrates leadership and tactical skill in a flashback, wearing commando gear and leading two agents on a mission.
Hesitates with finger on the trigger instead of shooting Trevelyan.
Moves stealthily and commands team to approach carefully, showing tactical focus.
Takes charge of the mission, signals team to wait and approach from different angles, moves stealthily and stays low while advancing.
Carefully observes the target via binoculars and sniper scope before taking action, showing patience and tactical awareness.
Nonchalantly eats a strawberry while preparing to shoot, displaying calmness under pressure and confidence.
Hesitates at the moment of taking a shot, finger frozen on the trigger, showing a momentary doubt.
Hesitates before shooting Trevelyan, sparing his life despite having the chance to kill him instantly.
Kills two Russian guards without hesitation to protect Trevelyan momentarily.
Displays shock and then hatred at Trevelyan's betrayal, indicating a sense of loyalty and emotional investment.
Prioritizes survival, running to safety after being exposed and fired upon, showing cautious self-preservation rather than recklessness.
Takes precise sniper shots to kill two guards, demonstrating marksmanship and tactical patience.
Hesitates before taking the shot on Trevelyan, showing caution and decision-making under pressure.
Uses a flashlight signal to communicate with Trevelyan, indicating use of non-verbal tactics to control the situation.
Is illuminated by truck headlights and exposed due to Trevelyan's betrayal, which leads to being caught in a crossfire.
Responds quickly to machine gunfire by diving and retreating to safety, showing survival instinct and adaptability.
Observes the betrayal through binoculars after retreating, maintaining situational awareness despite adversity.
Ultimately is captured and restrained, indicating a failure to fully secure the situation or anticipate betrayal consequences.
Calmly assesses prison conditions without complaint, adapts to present circumstances.
Shows resourcefulness by using the rug to drag the wire screen in front of the fireplace.
Assesses his surroundings calmly after awakening in captivity, noting details such as armored glass and location of seaplane.
Uses his feet and a rug to try to drag over the wire screen in front of the fireplace, indicating resourcefulness despite being immobilized.
Works urgently and calmly on handcuff lock despite explosion impact.
Urgently works to pick the handcuff lock immediately after explosion impact, showing focus and prompt reaction under pressure.
Remaining calm and alert enough to lock eyes with Trevelyan, indicating awareness despite disadvantaged position.
Desperately manipulates the handcuff lock to free himself, protecting himself from the missile blast.
Struggles from wreckage, bloodied, and attempts to escape despite severe danger.
No indication of showing mercy or hesitation toward enemies; focus is on survival and mission.
Chooses not to kill Trevelyan when given the chance, despite danger to himself.
Refuses to use lethal force impulsively, showing restraint under pressure.
Edges toward a broken marble column that could be used as a weapon but does not attack.
Speaks with contempt and challenges Trevelyan, showing defiance but not hostility beyond verbal.
Edges closer to a potential weapon while negotiating with Trevelyan, showing awareness and readiness despite the situation.
Fails to take a clean shot to kill Trevelyan during a rescue attempt, potentially due to hesitation.
Maintains composure under duress, responds with contempt to threat, showing mental toughness and confidence.
Is forced to drop to his knees and be captured because of Trevelyan’s superior positioning and preparation.
Refuses to shoot Trevelyan when threatened at gunpoint, showing restraint despite danger.
Plays for time and tries to bluff Trevelyan to prevent disaster, indicating protective and strategic behavior focused on preventing harm.
Springs toward the broken window to shield himself and avoid crossfire, showing calmness under pressure.
Springs toward the broken window under heavy crossfire, using the bullets from the dying Russian's gun as cover, showing quick reflexes and situational awareness.
Calmly holds up his hands and tries not to appear threatening to Marina, approaching her to convince her to escape.
Lunges to protect Marina from Morley’s flamethrower attack, risking his own safety.
Dives out the window and rolls to escape gunfire, showing physical agility and quick reflexes.
Calmly holds up his hands and tries to de-escalate the situation with Marina who is frightened and aiming a gun at him.
Recognizes imminent danger (Morley with a flamethrower) before Marina does and lunges to protect her, demonstrating situational awareness and quick decision-making.
Grabs Marina’s hand and pulls her out of danger, shields her from the explosion, holding her close and taking the gun from her.
Uses a poker to divert the flamethrower nozzle, attempting to control the threat despite high danger.
Seizes the opportunity to rush and kick Morley, effectively disabling the opponent.
Immediately pulls Marina to safety through the window and shields her from the explosion.
Takes the gun away from Marina after the explosion to maintain control of the situation.
Releases his grip on Marina instead of harming her when he could have.
Introduces himself calmly to Marina, attempting to establish trust under stress.
Focuses on neutralizing threats strategically rather than indiscriminately firing at enemies.
Releases a terrified captive instead of killing her, showing restraint and control.
Maintains composure under fire and leads a run across an exposed yard with a frightened companion.
Stops running to target the helicopter's missile launcher rather than the pilot or assassins, demonstrating strategic targeting.
Successfully shoots a missile inside its launch tube, triggering a large explosion that neutralizes multiple threats.
Helps Marina into the seaplane’s passenger door despite ongoing gunfire.
Smiles at the chaos behind him, showing triumph before realizing the plane is trapped in ice.
Stops running under heavy gunfire and skillfully shoots the helicopter's missile launch tube, causing a massive explosion that neutralizes the threat.
Helps Marina into the seaplane quickly to facilitate their escape under fire.
Realizes and immediately acknowledges that the seaplane is immobilized due to being frozen into the ice, showing situational awareness.
Smiles and shows a look of triumph despite ongoing danger, suggesting confidence and calm under pressure.
Has only one idea for escape despite clearly disliking it and the dire circumstances, indicating possible limited options but also determination.
Helps Marina into the seaplane’s passenger door amid gunfire.
Smiles at the chaos behind him with a look of triumph while escaping danger.
Acts decisively and protects himself and Marina by firing at the helicopter’s missile launchers.
Focuses on escape and survival under extreme threat, showing no explicit care beyond mission and self-preservation.
Shoots the helicopter’s missile launch tube, causing it to explode and neutralizing a dangerous threat.
Starts the engine of an iced-over seaplane under intense pressure, managing to move it off the ice despite the pontoons being frozen and heavy.
Uses the ice-skidding plane as a weapon by steering it toward assassins, knocking some unconscious and disrupting their attack.
Begins to get in the seaplane but quickly realizes the plane’s pontoons are frozen and heavy, reflecting on this sudden change in fortune.
Stops running while under fire from multiple assassins and a helicopter, then chooses to shoot the helicopter’s missile tubes instead of the pilot or gunmen, demonstrating tactical thinking.
Despite the difficult situation, maintains a smile and a look of triumph after blowing up the helicopter, showing confidence and composure.
Recognizes that the seaplane is immobilized due to the iced pontoons and quickly reassesses the situation despite the changed circumstances.
Takes initiative by firing at the ice around the pontoons to break it and attempts a difficult takeoff under fire.
Uses the limited mobility of the plane to his advantage by steering it toward the assassins and knocking some unconscious, showing tactical ingenuity and courage.
Directs the plane toward the rapids as the only viable escape route despite the obvious dangers, demonstrating decisiveness and calculated risk-taking.
Maintains composure under intense pressure, steering through dangerous rapids and trying to avoid obstacles even while under fire.
Fails to prevent the grenade explosion that damages the plane's right pontoon, putting them at great risk of crashing.
Shoots to shatter ice around pontoons to enable plane movement.
Collides with assassins using the plane’s wing to incapacitate them.
Directs the plane to escape through dangerous rapids with Marina onboard despite her screams.
Focuses on piloting and protecting himself and Marina under heavy fire, showing no explicit concern for others beyond immediate companions.
Deliberately steers the plane toward a rock, causing damage to escape assassins and save himself and Marina.
Initiates a risky maneuver that causes the pontoon to slam into a motorcyclist, contributing to his death.
